item.description:
Incubators!! I know talk about late notice but tonight aka Friday, May 22nd Lost Marbles Improv which features some of your incubators has a show out in lovely Watertown.

If you are looking for a laugh come find us and if you had no clue what you were going to do with a hot steamy muggy Friday night, come sit inside the AC and enjoy our set.

Tonight we are gladly hosted by ImprovJones who will be following our act with their own stylings of Improv games.

$10 at the door

for two great Improv acts!

Any questions?

Let me know!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: On the floor which is the stage...dong something....silly!
item.name: Lost Marbles present the Second Coming of Comedy!
